name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior Site Reliability Engineer with 8+ years in software engineering, I bring a proven track record in ensuring the reliability, security, and performance of large-scale systems. Adept in **Go**, **Linux**, **Cassandra**, **Redis**, and **Elasticsearch**, I specialize in creating resilient infrastructure using **Terraform** and implementing **gRPC**, **Kafka**, and **PubSub/SQS** for streamlined communication. My experience with **CI/CD** pipelines and **Infrastructure-as-Code** enables efficient deployment and management of cloud resources, specifically on **GCE** and **EC2**. Beyond my core skills, I am proficient in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy) and frontend technologies like **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**, which I utilize to deliver comprehensive solutions tailored to meet diverse business requirements. With a keen focus on debugging and system security, I ensure robust and reliable architectures that drive operational excellence.
